ComicInfo.Title: Awakening II - Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
“AWAKENINGS II,” Part Two
Samhain approaches. Rowan and Morgan get a break on their case, while Alex pursues an investigation all her own. The Hammer identifies Rowan and considers how to deal with the threat she poses.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|--------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Nicola Scott | 1 | | B | Cover B | Jenny Frison | 2 |
